ISSUE.TITLE: Pass more parameters in create group API
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Feature Request Hello and thanks for your work maintaining this repo. Currently the create group API (POST /v1/groups/{number}) accepts the parameters `name` and `members`, then passes them to the [updateGroup](https://github.com/AsamK/signal-cli/blob/master/man/signal-cli.1.adoc#updategroup) CLI command. It would be very useful to me to pass the additional parameters: -d DESCRIPTION, --link LINK_STATE, --set-permission-edit-details PERMISSION. Would it be possible to add those as optional parameters to the REST endpoint and then pass them to the CLI command?
